task.title: Eucalyptus Migration to Edge Networking Mode
task.shortdesc: You can configure your existing cloud to use Edge networking mode. This topic provides instructions for configuring and installing additional Eucalyptus components in an existing environment for the purpose of moving to Edge.

context.note: Migrating to Edge will require downtime of your cloud platform.

substep.cmd: Find out which instances are running:

step.cmd: Edit all the config files on NC and CC for Edge networking mode. For more information, see .
Start all components: CLC, CC, WS, SC, NCs. For more information, see .
Set the Edge JSON property. For more information, see .

taskbody.result: Your Edge networking mode is now properly configured.
